attributes.action: Stop or Reduce The Cost of Tax and Reduce the Price of Petrol in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop or Reduce The Cost of Tax and Reduce the Price of Petrol in the UK.

People are going bankrupt because of the prices of petrol and the tax in the UK, If he does not reduce these costs then more people will end up Bankrupt.

rejection.details: Thank you but there is a very similar petition open at them moment http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FuelDuty99/ Please re-submit if you still wish to lodge this petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
